_source.text: 4 The chance of a woman having invasive breast cancer some time during her life is about 1 in 8 4 and the chance of dying from the disease is about 1 in 36. 4 The good news is that breast cancer statistics show death rates have been declining, probably because of earlier detection and better treatment.
